candidates.title: HTTP signature parser and builder legacy support
candidates.body:
- builder do not add spaces between fields of the produced signature
- builder do not add quotes on integers (eg: created=2923983 instead of
created="2923983")
- parser supports values with quotes or no quotes at all regardless of
the parameter

That is, produced HTTP signatures by builder are now like:
```
Signature
keyId="my-rsa-key",created=1402170695,headers="(request-target)
(created) date",signature="..."
```

Parser can read anything like above and even weirdly formatted
signatures like:
```
Signature keyId = my-rsa-key, created=
"1402170695",headers=(request-target) (created) date, signature=...
```

You can build a legacy HTTP signature by calling the `legacy` method on the HTTP Signature builder (see legacy test).

candidates.title: Config system refactoring + partial hot reload for dev purposes
candidates.body: Partial hot reload system can be reused later when we support config loading from database instead.

candidates.title: Update addressing format as specified in spec doc
candidates.body: Migration is automatically performed if v0 schema is detected.

candidates.title: Clean up deprecated routes from server REST API
Provisioner issued Json Web Token identification for signing requests
Add fuzzer + fix issues found using it
picky: add JWT expiration check utility method
wayk-1735 - Removed color from logs
candidates.body: Color in log is a problem with datadog. We remove color from saphir.

candidates.title: Move our serde_asn1_der fork as picky_asn1_der
